title: Becoming a student again
creator_credit: John Garrity and Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology
brief_description: A motivational program aimed at putting mature-age students at ease with the idea of returning to study at TAFE colleges. Indicates the process of enrolment, the expectations of students and the TAFE colleges, and the problems likely to be encountered at home by mature age students.
